content.text: Match ends, Wigan Athletic 0, Southampton 2.
Second Half ends, Wigan Athletic 0, Southampton 2.
Foul by Oriol Romeu (Southampton).
Ryan Colclough (Wigan Athletic) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Shane Long (Southampton) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Nick Powell (Wigan Athletic).
Goal!  Wigan Athletic 0, Southampton 2. Cédric Soares (Southampton) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the left to the bottom right corner following a fast break.
Corner,  Wigan Athletic. Conceded by Wesley Hoedt.
Nick Powell (Wigan Athletic) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Oriol Romeu (Southampton).
Offside, Southampton. Wesley Hoedt tries a through ball, but Dusan Tadic is caught offside.
Substitution, Southampton. Oriol Romeu replaces Manolo Gabbiadini.
Foul by Cheyenne Dunkley (Wigan Athletic).
Shane Long (Southampton) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
